title: Call for Research Participants
selftext:
Hello! 👋

CALL FOR RESEARCH PARTICIPANTS!! 

As a part of my curriculum, I am conducting a research study on
 *_Examining the Relationship between Teacher Emotions, Psychological Safety and Job Characteristics_*

You are eligible to participate in the study if you fulfill the following criteria:

1. You are an educator at a school in India 🏫🎒
2. You are able to read and understand English✍️

The survey will take 10-15 minutes to complete and your response will remain strictly confidential. Your participation in the study is completely voluntary and the information provided will be used only for research purposes.

If you fulfill the criteria, please follow the link below:
https://forms.gle/ZyqRKatKKRtS5JTU9

For any further queries, please contact:
sonal.sanghamitra@psy.christuniversity.in

Thank you!🚌
